Text.Page:
I'm going to start you on one of our toughest foes: the {@LinkCreature:10#16#naga clawriders}. They're blocking the road between here and Serpentis Isle, the route we use to send reinforcements on to the Beachhead.

Of course, we never seem to get reinforcements, only stragglers like you. I wonder if Cutthroat Harbor is having troubles, too?
That's some fine fighting, <PCNAME>. A few more soldiers like you might see us tame this province once and for all!
